sense.gloss: opening to the public, making available to the public, exhibiting, unveiling, release (of a film, information, etc.), disclosure, publication
holding (a conference, exhibition, etc.), opening, hosting (e.g. the Olympics)
expansion, spreading out, extending, deployment, building up
to open, to undo, to unseal, to unpack
to bloom, to unfold, to spread out
to open (for business, e.g. in the morning)
to be wide (gap, etc.), to widen
to hold (meeting, party, etc.), to give, to open
to found (nation, dynasty, sect, etc.), to open (a new business), to set up, to establish, to start
to open up (new land, path, etc.), to clear, to develop
to be vacant, to be available, to be free
to have been opened (of one's eyes, mouth, etc.)
to have a hole, to form a gap, to have an interval (between events)

sdata.j: ↑電車↑↓でんしゃ↓が↑停↑↓とま↓まるまで↑開↑↓あ↓けないで。
sdata.e: Don't open before the train stops.

sdata.j: ↑口↑↓くち↓を↑開↑↓あ↓けてください！
↑意志↑↓いし↓があるところに↑道↑↓みち↓は↑開↑↓あ↓ける。
sdata.e: Where there's a will, there's a way.

sdata.j: もうすぐ↑授業↑↓じゅぎょう↓が↑再開↑↓さいかい↓する。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑職務↑↓しょくむ↓↑怠慢↑↓たいまん↓の↑申↑↓もう↓し↑開↑↓ひら↓きをしなければならない。
sdata.e: You must account for your neglect of duty.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑道↑↓みち↓を↑切↑↓き↓り↑開↑↓ひら↓こうとすべきだ。
sdata.e: You should try to cut your way.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑行動↑↓こうどう↓の↑申↑↓もう↓し↑開↑↓ひら↓きをしなければならない。
sdata.e: You must account for your conduct.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はそれをなにで↑開↑↓あ↓けましたか。
sdata.e: What did you open it with?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は、↑窓↑↓まど↓を↑開↑↓あ↓けたままにしておきましたか。
sdata.e: Did you leave the window open?

sdata.j: ↑窓↑↓まど↓を↑開↑↓あ↓けっぱなしにしておいたの？
sdata.e: Did you leave the window open?

words.gloss: opening to the public, making available to the public, exhibiting, unveiling, release (of a film, information, etc.), disclosure, publication
holding (a conference, exhibition, etc.), opening, hosting (e.g. the Olympics)
